typeSystemDescription.name: NemexTypes
typeSystemDescription.description: This type definition XML file defines types needed for NEMEX-A and related modules.

typeDescription.name: eu.excitement.type.nemex.NemexType
typeDescription.description: This type is the annotation type designed for the Nemex-A annotator(s).

featureDescription.name: values
featureDescription.description: This feature is an array (uima StringArray) that holds values matched by the Nemex-A lookup.
